akn:content.akn:p:
§ 6763. Federal funding prohibited The Association may not receive, accept, or borrow any amounts from the Federal Government to pay for, or reimburse,11 So in original. The comma probably should not appear. the Association for, the costs of establishing or operating the Association. (Pub. L. 106–102, title III, § 333, as added Pub. L. 114–1, title II, § 202(a), Jan. 12, 2015, 129 Stat. 27.)
Editorial Notes Prior ProvisionsA prior section 6763, Pub. L. 106–102, title III, § 333, Nov. 12, 1999, 113 Stat. 1432, related to relationship to State law, prior to the general amendment of this subchapter by Pub. L. 114–1. See section 6760 of this title.
